item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Happy birthday! I can't believe it is 30 years since I was in Heath Road and Dad got let off for speeding by a nice policeman when he told him his first son had just been born!! The weather here seems to have picked up finally - we are waiting for Si & Fi toarrive - we will drink your health!!<br/>Love Mum & Dad</p>
item.content:encoded:
Happy birthday! I can’t believe it is 30 years since I was in Heath Road and Dad got let off for speeding by a nice policeman when he told him his first son had just been born!! The weather here seems to have picked up finally – we are waiting for Si & Fi toarrive – we will drink your health!!
Love Mum & Dad
